name: powerRibs
description:
powerRibs material is designed for manufacturing fiber reinforced composite products with high performance and low environmental impact. This special fabric creates rib structure on one surface of the composite layer, significantly increasing the flexural stiffness and damping properties of thin composite shells with little additional weightpowerRibs material is designed for manufacturing fiber reinforced composite products with high performance and low environmental impact. This special fabric creates rib structure on one surface of the composite layer, significantly increasing the flexural stiffness
and damping properties of thin composite shells with little additional weight
